General.Name: Qinchuan Machine Tool & Tool Group Share Co Ltd
General.Description: Qinchuan Machine Tool & Tool Group Share Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells precision CNC machine tools and cutting tools in China. It offers lathes, gear grinding machines, machining centers, precision grinders, measuring equipment, and plastics machinery; and precision castings, screws, guide rails, and hydraulic parts and systems. The company also provides gear cutting tools, broaching cutters, milling tools, and thread grinders; and precision gearboxes and gear parts, and CNC technology. Qinchuan Machine Tool & Tool Group Share Co., Ltd. was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Baoji, China.
